line.comment: * If $posArray is a sector, a random position in that sector will be found.
* If $homebase is specified, the ship will be spawned there, otherwise to $posArray in sector $posArray[3].
* Avoid docking more ships than $homebase can handle.

line.text: 'Critical error in Mayhem.BuildShip. Please report with the following arguments: '

line.comment: * We add missiles and CCDS in Mayhem.Task.TemplateWhenReady -> Mayhem.EquipShip.Missiles.

sval.val: Critical error in Mayhem.BuildShip. Please report with the following arguments:
If $posArray is a sector, a random position in that sector will be found.
If $homebase is specified, the ship will be spawned there, otherwise to $posArray in sector $posArray[3].
Avoid docking more ships than $homebase can handle.
We add missiles and CCDS in Mayhem.Task.TemplateWhenReady -> Mayhem.EquipShip.Missiles.
